peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I know if my silverware is worth anything?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Inspect the pieces looking for markings such as “925,” “. 925” or “sterling” for pieces made in the U.S. These pieces are usually darker in color and are naturally lighter in weight. Sterling silver pieces have intrinsic value, and can often be resold.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How to Identify Valuable Silverware - Fruitcocktail Collectables

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How much is scrap silverware worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: What is scrap silver worth per gram? Scrap silver is worth $0.78 per gram sterling scrap, $0.76 per gram 90% coin silver, and $0.34 per gram 40% silver. The value of scrap silver is always based on its weight and using a good working scale to verify the weight before selling is a good idea.
